name: Tenets of Masked Rider
entries: Masked Identity. Many Masked Riders keep their identity hidden, as they are meant to be a symbol to the people.
Inspire Hope. Your feats are meant to inspire those around you to one day take up the Mask and carry on your legacy.
Heroics are all but Silent. Defeating a foe should be a spectacle, marked with explosions and high flying stunts.
